root_causes: Missing invocation of the question's custom validation (ValidationCode). The expected logic includes validateB5d("S7_2","B5ex2_4","hDUMB5eCol2_2","B5eDKx2"), but the script does not call this routine or implement its checks.
instructions: Include the custom validation validateB5d for B5ex2. Specifically, after/alongside the existing range checks, invoke validateB5d("S7_2","B5ex2_4","hDUMB5eCol2_2","B5eDKx2") and select/list cases where that validation signals an error.

If validateB5d is not available as a callable SPSS function, implement the equivalent validation logic described by that routine (consistency/sum checks across B5ex2_1..B5ex2_4) and include those checks in the sel if condition so inconsistent responses are flagged.
Maintain the existing numeric bounds (>=0 and <=9999) and the allowance for special codes 97/98/99 when applying the custom validation (i.e., do not flag special-code responses as errors).
